name: CreateCompanySuiRates
description:
Create company State Unemployment Insurance (SUI) rates.

This tool is used to create one or multiple company SUI rates for USA Payroll. It requires specifying necessary fields like companyInstance, stateInstance, taxCode, and startDate. Use for managing payroll tax filings.

parameters.name: sui_rates_data
parameters.description: JSON formatted data for creating SUI rates. Include companyInstance, stateInstance, taxCode, startDate. For bulk creation, use a JSON array.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
